attributes.action: Make it free for higher education students to get to and from school on public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Governmant want students to stay on after their GCSE's and either go into collee or carry on into 6th form, but it is hard for many students to do this who do not live within walking distance of their school/ college. 

There is a bus that i have used for free to get to and from school every school day of my life until i started my A levels, when i have to pay around £300 for a bus pass!

This is absolutly idiotic as it means there are more cars on the road from journeys that only need use of a bus already on the road and also makes it hard for people to get to their desired place of education, let alone any!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
